item.title: Trump Should Withdraw U.S. Support for Corrupt U.N. Agencies
item.description: UNRWA and UNIFIL are ineffective at their stated missions and help Hamas and Hezbollah.

item.title: Charitable Contributions Don’t Belong to the Government
item.description: A recent case for higher taxes on philanthropic enterprises appears to betray a fundamental belief that all private funds belong to the state.

item.title: Alcohol Warning Labels Are Nanny Statism at Its Worst
item.description: Proof that Democrats seek equity in misery.

item.title: Schiele’s Not Just for Nudes Anymore
item.description: The Neue Galerie’s Schiele landscape show and book examine the last Old Master.

item.title: How England Failed Sara Sharif
item.description: Three people are imprisoned in relation to the murder. But far more people are guilty.
